greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest multiple of n using only digits 0 and 4.
comment: a(n) = min{A169967(k): k > 1 and A169967(k) mod n = 0}. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 10 2012]
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..998
program: a078243 n = head [x | x <- tail a169967_list, mod x n == 0]
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 23 2002
